text: Tangiriapal railway station is a railway station on the East Coast Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Tangiriapal village. Its code is TGRL. It has one platforms. Passenger, MEMU, Express trains halt at Tangiriapal railway station. ==Major Trains== * Puri - Barbil Express ==See also== * Jajpur district ==References== Category:Railway stations in Jajpur district Category:Khurda Road railway division
title: Tangiriapal railway station
